about_the_game:
The new secretary system will solve most of the tedious operation matters for you.

After completing Lucia's help story, she will be able to unlock the function of the prison secretary.

Lucia can not only automatically purchase raw materials for you, make orders for goods, but also sell products in a quantitative manner according to the price set by the warden.

In addition, Lucia can also order, purchase and sell all the vehicles which you can purchase outside. and orders for takeaway food for you.

Of course, under the high working environment of the warden every day. Lucia can also help you relax, and even you can take her back for the night to restore more energy and mood.

* Both the Story Mode and the Empire Mode will be able to unlock the secretary after completing the "Lucia's help" event.
